query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')and est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE=0 or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.OPERATEUSERID in (@userByDeptid@) and est.OPERATEUSERID is not null and est.complainttype1 in (@complainttype1@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.sheetid,est.mainid,est.title,est.complainttype1,est.todeptid,est.senduserid from est_complaint est where est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE=0 or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s3@'

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE=0 or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.mainid not in (select distinct est1.mainid from est_complaint est1 where est1.status=1 and (est1.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE=0 or est1.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est1.operatetype=46 or est1.operatetype=11) and est1.completeflag=2)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.sheetid,est.mainid,est.title,est.complainttype1,est.todeptid,est.senduserid from est_complaint est where est.status=1 and (est.maindelayflag=0 or est.maindelayflag is null) and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s3@'

query-define.name: query3
query-define.where: est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE=0 or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.completeflag=2

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.sheetid,est.mainid,est.title,est.complainttype1,est.todeptid,est.senduserid from est_complaint est where est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE=0 or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s3@'

query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')and est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE=0 or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.OPERATEROLEID in ('@subroleFromDeptid@') and est.OPERATEROLEID is not null and est.complainttype1 in (@complainttype1@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.sheetid,est.mainid,est.title,est.complainttype1,est.todeptid,est.senduserid from est_complaint est where est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE=0 or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.OPERATEROLEID='@s1@' and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s3@'

query-define.where: est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE=0 or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.mainid not in (select distinct est1.mainid from est_complaint est1 where est1.status=1 and (est1.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE=0 or est1.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est1.operatetype=46 or est1.operatetype=11) and est1.completeflag=2)

query-define.where: est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE=0 or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.completeflag=2
